name: Canada
slogan: A world-class education, affordable tuition, and a welcoming environment—Canada has it all. It’s no surprise that over 800,000 international students call it home. Whether you prefer the bustling energy of Toronto or the scenic beauty of Vancouver, Canada offers top-ranked universities with strong post-study work opportunities. The country’s emphasis on innovation and research makes it an ideal place to grow academically and professionally.

universities.name: University of Toronto
universities.description: Canada's top university with a strong emphasis on research and innovation.

universities.name: University of British Columbia
universities.description: A leading global center for research and teaching with stunning campuses.

universities.name: McGill University
universities.description: One of Canada's oldest universities with a reputation for excellence.

benefits: Studying in Canada can lead directly to permanent residency through Express Entry and Provincial Nominee Programs. Canada offers lower tuition fees compared to the US and UK with similar quality of education and global recognition. Students can work up to 20 hours per week during studies and receive a 3-year post-graduation work permit. Canada consistently ranks as one of the safest countries in the world with low crime rates and excellent healthcare. Experience a truly multicultural society that celebrates diversity and inclusion. International students can access Canada's renowned public healthcare system in most provinces.
